1.content:
Jack is just watching tv browsing through to find his favourite show until all of a sudden he gets sucked into the TV

Where does he go.
1.title: TV WORLD

11.content:
You wake up in a strange and soft environment, so look at your giant surroundings and you realise that you are in a giant room

“What on Earth is going...*STOMP*” Jack is interrupted

Jack turns around and sees.
11.title: Breaking Bad

choices: Skylar steps on you And gets stuck
Skylar spots you and thinks your a bug
111.content:
Jack turns around and sees Skylar White (https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0903747/med...) the wife of Walter White, you also realise that you a 1cm tall and in the tv show Breaking Bad.

You always found her annoying, but you can’t get over how gorgeous she is. her beautiful blonde hair, her MILFy figure and her voice.

“My dream as come true” said Jack “im actually at the presence of the beautiful Skylar White”

Jack is in the living room and Skylar is walking from her bedroom to the hallway.

Skylar steps are like bombs going off and both legs are the size of the Burj Kalifa each.

Skylar is walking towards And is barefoot (https://www.wikifeet.com/Anna_Gunn#&gid=...)

What happens next.
111.title: Skylar White

131.content:
Jack looks around and sees a giant legs walking over him, Dr Jennifer Melfi (https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0141842/med...).

Jack realised that he is in favourite show The Sopranos and he is at Dr Melfi’s office but 1cm tall.

Jack has always had a crush on Melfi, her full lips, those glasses, her figure, THOSE LEGS!

“Oh my gosh this is a dream come true” Said Jack who is overly excited.

Dr Melfi sits down in on her desk and is working, Jack sneaks under her desk and witness her giant high heels (you always had a food fetish). Melfi takes of her shoes and reveals stocking covered feet

You come to get a closer look and what happens next.
131.title: Dr Jennifer Melfi

1312.content:
Jack thinks it’s a good idea to climb up up Melti’s legs to get her attention.

He approaches Melfi’s beautiful stocking covered feet and gets distracted by the aroma of Melfi’s giant feet.

Jack shrugged it Of because he needs to focus on getting her attention.

Jack climbs up Melfi’s leg using the stocking material to help him climb.

Melfi feels something annoying on her leg, Jack sees a giant hand coming towards him, Melfi scratches for legs.

Jack falls but grapes catches her legs before he it’s the ground.

After he climbs up to the top of her legs, he decides to.....
1312.title: Jack climbs up Melfi

choices: Melfi feels something in her pants
Tony Soprano walks in for some “therapy”
13122.content:
You can’t fight the impulse, you decide fuck it and run inside Melfi’s skirt.

You tread lightley as Melfli is doing work on her desk. You go into the dark cave that is Melfi’s skirt and you see a small hole that directly leads into her panties.

You crawl underneath the stockings and make it to the vagina.

What happens next.
13122.title: Go inside her skirt

info.brief_description: You get mysteriously shrunk in your favourite show and meet the women you love PLEASE ADD
info.description:
You are Jack, a 13 year old boy who wish he could live in his favourite tv show, but one day your mysteriously sucked into the tv and there you are

RULES:
1). Keep It On One TV Show
2). Keep It Unaware (Of They Do Find Him He’s A Bug Or Toy)
3). Female Interaction Only (Maybe Couple)
4). Anything Sexual Goes (No Poop)
5). No Deaths
6). Describe What Their Wearing (Or Try To Use Images To Show What Their Wearing)
info.pretty_title: Shrunk In Your Favourite TV Shows
